A4.text: Ur was a major Sumerian city-state in ancient Mesopotamia

A5.text: Ur came under the control of the Semitic-speaking Akkadian Empire (c. 2334â€“2154 BC) founded by Sargon the Great between the 24th and 22nd centuries BC

A6.text: Ur was listed as a Sumerian city-state in the text, explicitly marked with 'SC' (Sumerian civilization) in the list of ancient cities.

A7.text: The Uruk period, a key era in Sumerian history, is directly associated with Ur in the text, reinforcing its connection to the Sumerian civilization.
